sys_script_include.name: HBCatalogUtils

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_cd0bb602db51a1102dd8ecebd39619b7
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.HBCatalogUtils</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>HBCatalogUtils</name><script><![CDATA[var HBCatalogUtils = Class.create();
HBCatalogUtils.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
	
	getUserLocation: function() {
		console.log('into script include');
        try {
            var user = this.getParameter('sysparm_user');

            var userGR = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
            if (userGR.get(user)) {
                var results = {
                    "sys_id": userGR.getValue('location'),
                    "name": userGR.getDisplayValue('location')
                };
                return JSON.stringify(results);
            }
        } catch (e) {
            if (gs.isInteractive() && gs.hasRole('admin')) {
                gs.addInfoMessage('HBCatalogAjax: getUserLocation - ' + e);
            }
            gs.error(e);
        }
    },

    type: 'HBCatalogUtils'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-03-02 10:11:11</sys_created_on><sys_id>cd0bb602db51a1102dd8ecebd39619b7</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>HBCatalogUtils</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Hammerbarn" source="7fa6f53ddb9161102dd8ecebd39619f6">7fa6f53ddb9161102dd8ecebd39619f6</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Hammerbarn">7fa6f53ddb9161102dd8ecebd39619f6</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_cd0bb602db51a1102dd8ecebd39619b7</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-03-02 10:11:11</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
